titles: The pope in his fury doth answer returne, to a letter ye which to Rome is late come
author: Peele, Steven.
publisher: Imprinted by Alexander Lacie for Henrie Kyrkham, dwelling at the signe of the blacke Boy, at the middle north dore of Paules church,
notes: Verse - "I doe esteme your kyndnes much".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Papacy --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
